text: The long-term plan is to deliver assets read-only so that they can be updated without requiring a customer to swap out any published assets. We’ve tried this in the past, but as you mention below, the functionality wasn’t mature enough and it ended up causing more pain for customers when trying to make updates.
ideally read-only with ability to child-theme or have some method of modifying parts of a template without completely breaking updatability would be the best from the dev side of things
That’s the plan that we’ve been discussing
